pageContext.claim: “They are taking the nomination away from Bernie for a second time. Rigged!”
pageContext.analysis: There is no evidence the Democrats are "rigging" the election against Sen. Bernie Sanders. He just happens to be the opponent Trump would most like to run against. In response to this tweet, Sanders said: "Let’s be clear about who is rigging what: it is Donald Trump’s action to use the power of the federal government for his own political benefit that is the cause of the impeachment trial. His transparent attempts to divide Democrats will not work."
